text: "Crocodile Rock" is a 1972 song by Elton John and is the leading single to his sixth studio album Don't Shoot Me I'm Only the Piano Player. It went to number 1 in the United States, Canada, New Zealand, Italy and Switzerland, number 5 in the United States, number 2 in Zimbabwe and Australia and number 3 in Norway, Germany and Belgium. ==References== Category:1972 songs Category:Elton John songs Category:The Beach Boys songs Category:Baha Men songs Category:Glam rock songs Category:Pop rock songs
title: Crocodile Rock
